text: Monyreak "Monty" Oum (June 22, 1981 â€“ February 1, 2015) was an American animator. He was known for his crossover fighting videos and worked for Rooster Teeth Productions to animate for Red vs. Blue and RWBY. He began working for Rooster Teeth in 2005. Oum was born in Providence, Rhode Island. He was of Cambodian, Vietnamese, Chinese and Japanese ancestry. He was married to Sheena Duquette. He died from an allergic reaction as a result of the surgery on February 1, 2015. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1981 births Category:2015 deaths Category:Deaths from anaphylaxis Category:American animators Category:Deaths from surgical complications Category:People from Providence, Rhode Island
title: Monty Oum
